> >So said Ilja Preuss on 2003-05-07 --------------------
> >> I don't know how I can apply this to the solution of the 
example.
> >> 
> >> So stretchX(amount) will return a new Square object which is 
> >> stretched by X and Y with the same amount?
> >
> >No, it will return a new *Rectangle* object which is stretched 
only by
> >x.
> 
> Now *that* is beautiful. It has the feel of autoboxing 
quadrilaterals. In fact, if it turns out that all operations on 
quadrilaterals can be pushed up to the Quadrilateral base class, 
then effectively that's what it is.

I don't understand how this solves the problem.
